nsgl.real.random

Class Symmetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • nsgl.real.random.Symmetric
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Random

    public class Symmetric
extends java.lang.Object
implements Random

    Title: Symmetric

    Description: Generates random real numbers by combining a one side real random number distribution (for the value) and a boolean random distribution for the side.The one side distribution must be able to generate number in R+ = [0, inf)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Symmetric()
      Creates a symmetric real numbers random distribution with a side probability of 0.5 and a [0,1) uniform distribution, i.e., this distribution will generate uniform real numbers in the interval (-1, 1)
      Symmetric(Random one_side)
      Creates a symmetric real numbers random distribution with a side probability of 0.5 and the given one side distribution
      Symmetric(Random side, Random one_side)
      Creates a symmetric real numbers random distribution with the given side and one side distribution

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double next()
      Returns a random double number

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Methods inherited from interface nsgl.real.random.Random

        generate, generate

    • Constructor Detail

      • Symmetric

        public Symmetric()
        Creates a symmetric real numbers random distribution with a side probability of 0.5 and a [0,1) uniform distribution, i.e., this distribution will generate uniform real numbers in the interval (-1, 1)

      • Symmetric

        public Symmetric(Random one_side)
        Creates a symmetric real numbers random distribution with a side probability of 0.5 and the given one side distribution
        Parameters:
        one_side - One side real random number distribution for values

      • Symmetric

        public Symmetric(Random side,
                 Random one_side)
        Creates a symmetric real numbers random distribution with the given side and one side distribution
        Parameters:
        side - Boolean random distribution for the side.
        one_side - One side real random number distribution for values
